comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A stately venue for the wedding of Jessie Woodrow Wilson, daughter of President Woodrow Wilson, to Francis Bowes Sayre, on November 25, 1913.

comment.author: 49965511@N03
comment._content: The architecture is very interesting. The details on the ceiling are gorgeous and so is the chandelier. If I were having a wedding, I'd defiantly consider having it here.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Ah! And who would you be defying?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Bain's caption calls this the White House, not Wh. House.
